perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets. 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

perks.description:
Shots from this weapon knock the target back farther.
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: High-Caliber Rounds

perks.description:
Rounds ricochet off hard surfaces. 
  •  Increases stability 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Ricochet Rounds

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description:
Improved reload and range.
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Light Mag

perks.description: Reloading after defeating a target greatly increases target acquisition and aim down sight speed for a short duration.
perks.name: Tunnel Vision

perks.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a short duration.
perks.name: Steady Hands

perks.description: Each rapid kill with this weapon progressively increases reload speed for a short time.
perks.name: Feeding Frenzy

perks.description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants a stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.
perks.name: Well-Rounded

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus range until the wielder takes damage. The bonus returns when no damage is taken for a short duration.
perks.name: Fragile Focus

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon.
perks.name: Adrenaline Junkie

perks.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon until you are out of combat.
perks.name: Frenzy

perks.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.
perks.name: Rampage

perks.description: Defeating a Void-debuffed target grants an overshield.
perks.name: Repulsor Brace

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage. While this buff is active, grenade or melee kills of the same damage type greatly increase its damage and duration.
perks.name: Golden Tricorn

perks.description: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.
perks.name: Dragonfly

perks.description:
While this weapon is equipped, taking damage accelerates its next reload.

Taking more damage increases the effect.
perks.name: Bitterspite
